document_data.name: House of Bulad
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Bulad''' was a family of weaponsmiths whom many considered to be some of the best in all of [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The fires of the House of Bulad's smiths burned throughout the night in the [[foundries]] located just up [[Al-Wahl River]] from [[Hiyal]].
document_data.Members: Their patriarch, [[Bulad]], specialized in forging [[sword]]s. His daughter, [[Fuladayah bint Bulad]], took over her father's duties upon his death.
